name: defenselessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being weak and unable to protect yourself from attack: The judge spoke of the seriousness of the crime and the defenselessness of the victim. She felt a sense of her defenselessness in the face of physical force. See
defenseless
More examplesFewer examplesCriminals took advantage of the uncertain status of the colony and defenselessness of its inhabitants.The impossibility of punishing those truly responsible creates a feeling of defenselessness among the family of the victims.The constant state of stress caused by a feeling of defenselessness may make some people more prone to disease.
